# **<yaxp âš¡>**
Yet Another XSD Parser

## Introduction
Using [roxmltree](https://github.com/RazrFalcon/roxmltree) to parse XML files. 

Converts xsd schema to:
- [x] json
- [x] arrow
- [ ] avro
- [ ] protobuf
- [ ] jsonschema
- [ ] json representation of spark schema
- [ ] duckdb
